description: This versatile hat provides protection from sun and rain – great for trips when you’re likely to get both.Made of oil-treated canvas for waterproofness.The wide, 8.5cm brim shelters your face from beating rain and intense sun.Brim has snaps to secure it up when you want more visibility.The under-chin strap keeps it securely attached.Small fits 56cm; Medium fits 58cm; Large fits 60cm; XL 62cm.
name: KNP Oilskin Field Hat - Unisex
